about_the_game:
Outlaw Squadron is a turn-based air combat game with roguelike and card battler elements. Train your pilots, upgrade airplanes and build a legendary squadron to defeat your enemies.

Turn-Based Combat:

  • Engage in thrilling dogfights where speed, maneuvers, and skills are crucial.
  • Utilize unique team tactics to multiply your damage and protect your airplanes.

Autobattler Duels:

  • Collect cards to build the perfect set of skills.
  • Observe how your skills perform in auto battler duels and refine your strategies.

Roguelike Gameplay:

  • In each battle, you’ll decide whether to risk being overpowered and lose everything or build up your strength gradually.

Pilots:

  • Win battles to collect cards, which you can use to train pilots.
  • Create the perfect Squadron Leader or Wingman and become a Legendary Ace.

Airplanes:

  • Win airplanes and upgrade them to match your pilot’s skills.
  • Fly legendary airplanes like Spitfire, Messerschmitt Bf 109, P-51 Mustang, I-16, Mitsubishi A6M Zero, Me 262 and many more.

name: Outlaw Squadron

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows
  • Processor: Multicore with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB DX9 (shader model 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Outlaw Squadron is a turn-based air combat game with roguelike and card battler elements. Train your pilots, upgrade airplanes and build a legendary squadron to defeat your enemies.
